headline.main: ADMITS HE SERVED AS A NAZI AGENT; Wheeler-Hill Says at Trial That He Sent Data on Sailings of British Ships Only

lead_paragraph: Axel Wheeler-Hill, Russian-born naturalized American citizen, took the witness stand in his own behalf yesterday at the Brooklyn espionage trial and admitted that he had transmitted information to Germany regarding the sailings of British Freighters from New York harbor.
abstract: A Wheeler-Hill testifies; admits he sent data on Brit freighter sailings but not on U S shipping from N Y C
